浮.definition: to float; superficial; floating; unstable; movable; provisional; temporary; transient; impetuous; hollow; inflated; to exceed; superfluous; excessive; surplus

浮上.definition: to float up; to rise to the surface; fig. to rise in the world

浮光掠影.definition: flickering light and passing shadows (idiom); blurred scenery; cursory; superficial

浮出水面.definition: to float up (idiom); to become evident; to surface; to appear

浮利.definition: mere worldly, superficial gain, such as wealth and fame

浮力調整背心.pinyin: fu2 li4 tiao2 zheng3 bei4 xin1

浮力調整裝置.pinyin: fu2 li4 tiao2 zheng3 zhuang1 zhi4

浮圖.definition: variant of 浮屠[fu2 tu2]; alternative term for 佛陀[Fo2 tuo2]

浮塵.definition: dust (floating in the air or settled on a surface); large amount of airborne sand and dust, such as during a sandstorm

浮家泛宅.definition: lit. to live on a boat; to drift from place to place (idiom)

浮屠.definition: Buddha; Buddhist stupa (transliteration of Pali thupo)

浮山.definition: Fushan county in Linfen 臨汾|临汾[Lin2 fen2], Shanxi

浮山縣.definition: Fushan county in Linfen 臨汾|临汾[Lin2 fen2], Shanxi

浮想.definition: passing thought; an idea that comes into one's head; recollection

浮梁.definition: Fuliang county in Jingdezhen 景德鎮|景德镇, Jiangxi

浮梁縣.definition: Fuliang county in Jingdezhen 景德鎮|景德镇, Jiangxi

浮沉.definition: ups and downs (of life etc); to drift along; to sink and emerge

浮泛.definition: to float about; (of a feeling) to show on the face; (of speech, friendship etc) shallow; vague

浮游.definition: to float; to drift; to wander; variant of 蜉蝣[fu2 you2]

浮滑.definition: (of language or behavior) flippant and insincere

浮現.definition: (of a thought or image) to come to mind; (of a smile etc) to appear (on sb's face); (of a problem etc) to emerge

浮生六記.definition: Six Records of a Floating Life, autobiographical novel and description of Qing dynasty life by 沈復|沈复[Shen3 Fu4], published 1808

浮腫.definition: (nonspecialist term for 水腫|水肿[shui3 zhong3]) to suffer from edema; swollen; bloated; puffy

浮詞.definition: florid but insubstantial remarks; misleading way of saying sth

浮誇.definition: to exaggerate; to be boastful; pompous; grandiose

浮財.definition: movable property; money and belongings; non-real estate assets

浮貼.definition: to glue something lightly enough that it can be removed later

浮躁.definition: fickle and impatient; restless; giddy; scatterbrained

浮雲朝露.definition: floating clouds, morning dew (idiom); fig. ephemeral nature of human existence
